recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish with creamy sauce.
recipes.instructions: Boil pasta, cook pancetta, mix with eggs and cheese, combine with pasta.

recipes.title: Chicken Biryani
recipes.description: A flavorful rice dish with aromatic spices.
recipes.instructions: Marinate chicken, cook rice, layer and steam together.

recipes.title: Margherita Pizza
recipes.description: Simple pizza with fresh tomatoes, basil, and mozzarella.
recipes.instructions: Prepare dough. Spread sauce. Add cheese and basil. Bake.

recipes.title: Greek Salad
recipes.description: Refreshing salad with cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, and feta.
recipes.instructions: Chop vegetables. Mix with feta and olives. Drizzle olive oil.

recipes.title: Beef Tacos
recipes.description: Delicious beef tacos with fresh toppings.
recipes.instructions: Cook beef with spices. Fill taco shells. Add toppings.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipes.description: Quick and healthy stir-fried vegetables.
recipes.instructions: Chop vegetables. Stir-fry in a pan with soy sauce.

recipes.title: Avocado Toast
recipes.description: Simple and nutritious avocado toast with toppings.
recipes.instructions: Toast bread. Mash avocado. Add toppings.

recipes.title: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.description: Creamy risotto with mushrooms and Parmesan.
recipes.instructions: Cook rice with broth. Add mushrooms and Parmesan.

recipes.title: Homemade Burger
recipes.description: Juicy beef burger with fresh toppings.
recipes.instructions: Grill beef patty. Assemble burger with toppings.

recipes.title: Tomato Basil Soup
recipes.description: Rich tomato soup with fresh basil.
recipes.instructions: Cook tomatoes and basil. Blend and add cream.

recipes.title: Grilled Salmon
recipes.description: Perfectly grilled salmon with lemon and herbs.
recipes.instructions: Marinate salmon. Grill until cooked.

recipes.title: Chocolate Brownies
recipes.description: Fudgy and delicious chocolate brownies.
recipes.instructions: Mix ingredients. Bake until set.

recipes.title: Caprese Salad
recipes.description: Fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil salad.
recipes.instructions: Slice ingredients. Drizzle with oil and balsamic.

recipes.title: Chicken Curry
recipes.description: Spicy and flavorful chicken curry.
recipes.instructions: Cook chicken with spices. Add coconut milk and simmer.

recipes.title: Oatmeal Pancakes
recipes.description: Healthy pancakes made with oats and bananas.
recipes.instructions: Blend ingredients. Cook pancakes on a skillet.

recipes.title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipes.description: Bell peppers filled with seasoned rice and meat.
recipes.instructions: Stuff peppers with filling. Bake until tender.

recipes.title: Garlic Shrimp Pasta
recipes.description: Delicious shrimp pasta in garlic butter sauce.
recipes.instructions: Cook shrimp in garlic butter. Mix with pasta.

recipes.title: Lemon Cheesecake
recipes.description: Creamy cheesecake with a zesty lemon flavor.
recipes.instructions: Mix ingredients. Bake until set.

recipes.title: Pesto Pasta
recipes.description: Pasta with fresh basil pesto sauce.
recipes.instructions: Blend basil, nuts, garlic, and cheese. Toss with pasta.

recipes.title: Chicken Caesar Salad
recipes.description: Classic Caesar salad with grilled chicken.
recipes.instructions: Grill chicken. Toss with lettuce, croutons, cheese, and dressing.
